app.name: eyeson
app.short_description: Schedule video meetings straight from Zendesk
app.long_description:
Whether you make one-to-one video calls for spontaneous face-to-face communication, schedule video meetings for effective online collaboration or participate in webinars: use the full potential of communication and collaboration across distances and benefit from a scalable and future-proof solution.
Simple access
Our patented single-stream-solution is easily accessible via web browser or app and across different devices (desktop, smartphone, tablet). Simply login with your favorite social media account (Facebook, XING, LinkedIn) or email.
Secure platform
Our solution offers you state of-the-art environment for secure and confidential business communication.
Additional features
• Messaging & Image Chat
• Recording
• Slide Presentations
• Screen Cast
• Responsive
app.installation_instructions: Find the eyeson in the Zendesk marketplace.
